job.description: ltpgtGreetings from PhotonltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtWe have an opportunity for aampnbspltstronggtMachine Learning Engineer  Kubernetes Workflow Python AWSltstronggtampnbspwith one of our direct clientsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtRole is Remote to start but eventually onsite in RichmondVAltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtWho are WeltstronggtltpgtltpgtFor the past 20 years we have powered many Digital Experiences for the Fortune 500 for example if you bank with Chase or Citi you are likely to use what we have built for them Since 1999 we have grown from a few people to more than 4000 team members across the globe that are engaged in various Digital Modernization For a brief 1 minute video about us you can checkampnbspltugthttpsyoutubeuJWBWQZEA6oltugtltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtWhat we are looking forltstronggtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtKubernetesampnbspltpgtltpgtampnbsp Workflow one of these Kubeflow Prefect Airflowltpgtltpgtampnbsp Pythonltpgtltpgtampnbsp Microservice architectureltpgtltpgtampnbsp CICDltpgtltpgtampnbsp Preferably some exposure to a Cloud provider like AWSltpgt
